issue.title: www.atv.com.tr
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.atv.com.tr/canli-yayin](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.atv.com.tr%2Fcanli-yayin) ### Comment > This issue is caused by the "Hide IP Address" option in Privacy mode. > > Add this rule to your AdGuard Turkish filter. > `@@||securevideotoken.tmgrup.com.tr/webtv/secure^$stealth=ip` ### Screenshots

issue.title: https://www.hdmotori.it
issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Mac ### AdGuard version 2.16.4.1870 for Mac, 4.10 nightly 9 for Android ### What type of problem have you encountered? Missed ads or ad leftovers ### Which browser(s) do you use? Firefox ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? Ads are still there! ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets _No response_ ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List ### Security _No response_ ### Other _No response_ ### DNS filters _No response_ ### Language-specific EasyList Italy ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Ads are in every page 2. Screenshots ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition
